name: Create RSS Feed for Static or HTML website | Sarmad Gardezi
tagline: Create RSS Feed for Static or HTML website | Sarmad Gardezi
body:
# Generate RSS feed for your static / HTML nad PHP Website.

RSS Feed plays an importent role in getting your whole website Articles or Web Applications to get in google more
fast. You can use Rss Feedburner by #Google to link your Rss feed with Google feedburner.

Name the RSS feed file as "rss.xml" so that you can place a url like " www/domain.com/rss.xml" or
" http://sarmadgardezi.com/rss.xml " so that your RSS feed would work dynamically.

You can watch video that how to create RSS Feed by #SarmadGardezi from the Link below:

Link: https://youtu.be/TwZri73Yp7o
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
